name: SLUSH - Cut and Smash ! physics-based free game
name_original: SLUSH - Cut and Smash ! physics-based free game
description:
----All you need is a flash-----
SLUSH is a creative, intuitive and refreshing game which stimulates your brain. Now available on the app store. trace the screen and cut a block.Throw a block and hit enemies.

■ Simple operation and intuitive game play!
・ swipe the screen to cut a blue block
・ You’ll complete a stage when you hit enemies with a cut block!
